summary: This is a racemenu preset for the female nord that was loosely based off the appearance of SyFy channel's "Haunted Highway" reality television personality and "Poker Tonight" host Dana Workman. This is an early version and expect new revisions to be made to increase the likeness of her appearance.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This is a racemenu preset for the female nord that was loosely based off the appearance of SyFy channel's
"Haunted Highway" reality television personality and "Poker Tonight"
host Dana Workman. This is an early version and expect new revisions to
be made to increase the likeness of her appearance.[/b]
 
[b][color=#00ff00]===INSTALLATION===
Step 1. After downloading this file, go into the directory [i]my computer/local disk/program files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/i] and copy and paste the file Dana Workman.jslot into there. [color=#ffff00]NOTE: before the "chargen" directory is created, you have to save a preset in
racemenu, so just go into the racemenu screen and then go into presets,
then press F5 to save any preset and create the directory.[/color]
 
Step 2. Boot the game up, go into racemenu by typing "showracemenu" in the
console, then click "presets" on the bar in the top right of the screen,
and press F9 to load presets and load "Dana Workman.jslot" (it should
be in there) and voila, there you are![/color]
 [/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]===REQUIREMENTS===
*SKSE 1.7.3 or above
*Racemenu (latest version)
*Xenius Character Enhancement Compilation Pack <---- XCE Compilation Pack is not 100% necessary but is strongly recommended!
*Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition (CBBE) OR Dimonized UNP Skinny (UNP) whichever you prefer.
*True Eyes
*SGEyebrows
*Apachii Hair Females
 [/color]
[color=#ffff00]Make 100% sure that you have the above mods installed before playing this or else this will not work properly! [i]Follow the instructions very carefully![/i][/color]
 
[color=#00ffff]===Optional/Recommended===
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP
Red Dress UNP
HN66s Golden Earrings
Ashara Dimonized Dragon Dress And Jewelry
Dovabling Jewelry Replacer
Immersive Jewelry
Bracelets By Ezuka
Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE
Wedding Rings By Ezuka
FNIS Sexy Walk/FNIS 5.2

[/color][size=5]IF SOMEONE MAKE A FOLLOWER MOD OUT OF HER THAT WOULD BE FANTASTIC![/size][/b]
author: Kernel39
